channel.title: Wounding on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Wounding on funPlantGenes

item.title: CYP94C2b
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os12g05440 RAPdb gene ID: Os12g0150200 Gene Symbol: CYP94C2b Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: HbPLT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbPLT1 Gene Name: putative polyol transporter protein 1 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: Screening a latex-derived cDNA library using polyol transporter-specific probes, two full-length cDNAs were isolated, and named HbPLT1 and HbPLT2 (for Hevea brasiliensis polyol transporter 1 and 2, respectively).

item.title: HbPLT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbPLT2 Gene Name: putative polyol transporter protein 2 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: Screening a latex-derived cDNA library using polyol transporter-specific probes, two full-length cDNAs were isolated, and named HbPLT1 and HbPLT2 (for Hevea brasiliensis polyol transporter 1 and 2, respectively).

item.title: HbSUT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbSUT3 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 3 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: HbSUT3 encodes a functional sucrose transporter that exhibits high sucrose affinity with a Km value of 1.

item.title: IbMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbMYB1 Gene Name: MYB domain protein 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Interaction of small RNA–8105 and the intron of IbMYB1 RNA regulates IbMYB1 family genes through secondary siRNAs and DNA methylation after wounding.

item.title: IbNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: IbNAC1 was constitutively expressed in root tissues and was induced earlier than sporamin following the wounding of leaves.

item.title: IbpreproHypSys
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbpreproHypSys Gene Name: hydroxyproline-rich preprosystemin Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: The expression of IbpreproHypSys, encoding the precursor of IbHypSys, was induced in sweet potato (Ipomoea batatas cv.

item.title: LeGGPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGGPS1 Gene Name: geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeGGPS1 was predominantly expressed in leaf tissue and LeGGPS2 in ripening fruit and flower tissue.

item.title: LeGGPS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGGPS2 Gene Name: geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeGGPS1 was predominantly expressed in leaf tissue and LeGGPS2 in ripening fruit and flower tissue.

item.title: LoTPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LoTPS1 Gene Name: terpene synthase 1 Genome: Species: Lilium ‘Siberia’ (Oriental hybrid) Functional Descriptions: Floral scent formation in Lilium ‘Siberia’ is mainly due to monoterpene presence in the floral profile.

item.title: LoTPS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LoTPS3 Gene Name: terpene synthase 3 Genome: Lilium ‘Siberia’ (Oriental hybrid) Species: Lilium ‘Siberia’ (Oriental hybrid) Functional Descriptions: Floral scent formation in Lilium ‘Siberia’ is mainly due to monoterpene presence in the floral profile.

item.title: NaAGP4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaAGP4 Gene Name: Arabinogalactan protein4 Genome: Species: Nicotiana alata Functional Descriptions: NaAGP4 is an arabinogalactan protein whose expression is suppressed by wounding and fungal infection inNicotiana alata.

item.title: NaMEK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaMEK2 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Two mitogen-activated protein kinase kinases, MKK1 and MEK2, are involved in wounding- and specialist lepidopteran herbivore Manduca sexta-induced responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: NaMKK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaMKK1 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Two mitogen-activated protein kinase kinases, MKK1 and MEK2, are involved in wounding- and specialist lepidopteran herbivore Manduca sexta-induced responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: OsWRKY42;WRKY42
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g26430 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0462800 Gene Symbol: OsWRKY42 WRKY42 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PhBPBT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhBPBT Gene Name: benzoyl CoA:benzyl alcohol/phenylethanol benzoyltransferase Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Tissue-specific PhBPBT expression is differentially regulated in response to endogenous ethylene.

item.title: PhERS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhERS2 Gene Name: ethylene receptor2 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Characterization of two ethylene receptors PhERS1 and PhETR2 from petunia: PhETR2 regulates timing of anther dehiscence.

item.title: PORK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g123860 Gene Symbol: PORK1 Gene Name: PEPR1/2 ORTHOLOG RECEPTOR-LIKE KINASE1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: PORK1 Is Required for Tomato Seedling Growth Response to Systemin Peptide.

item.title: PtaZFP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtaZFP2 Gene Name: Cys2/His2 zinc finger protein Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: A single bending modified plant diameter growth and increased the relative abundance of PtaZFP2 transcripts.

item.title: PvLOX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvLOX6 Gene Name: Lipoxygenase 6 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Isolated the cDNA of a novel chloroplast-targeted Phaseolus vulgaris LOX, (PvLOX6).

item.title: RrMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RrMYB10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa rugosa Functional Descriptions: RrMYB5- and RrMYB10-regulated flavonoid biosynthesis plays a pivotal role in feedback loop responding to wounding and oxidation in Rosa rugosa.

item.title: RrMYB5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: RrMYB5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Rosa rugosa Functional Descriptions: RrMYB5- and RrMYB10-regulated flavonoid biosynthesis plays a pivotal role in feedback loop responding to wounding and oxidation in Rosa rugosa.

item.title: StPPI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StPPI1 Gene Name: proton pump interactor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Characterization of StPPI1, a proton pump interactor from Solanum tuberosum L.

item.title: TPK1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TPK1b Gene Name: TOMATO PROTEIN KINASE 1b Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: TPK1b, a key regulator of tomato defense against B.

item.title: ZmFPPS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb155590 Gene Symbol: ZmFPPS3 Gene Name: farnesyl diphosphate synthase3 Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, FPP synthases and several TPS are well characterized.

item.title: ZmPAO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZmPAO Gene Name: polyamine oxidase Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Maize (Zea mays) PAO (ZmPAO) is a developmentally regulated flavoprotein abundant in primary and secondary cell walls of several tissues.
